column4: Hello, I have a PIII dual processor server with 2G ram, should I install the SMP kernel for ubuntu 6.06 LTS?
it doesnt matter, smp will run fine on a single cpu machine

thank you, another question, right now i had to edit the startup for it in order to make ubuntu to boot I added 'noapic' command, how can i make the dual processor work or find out if is already working?
cat /proc/cpuinfo    and see if it lists both cpu's should be cpu0 and cpu1
